onyomiExamples.meaning: chimney, smokestack, funnel (of a ship), stovepipe, carrying a passenger without turning on the taximeter
tobacco, cigarette, cigaret, cigar, tobacco plant (Nicotiana tabacum)
mist over a body of water, spray, suien, four decorative metal plates joined at right angles forming part of a pagoda finial

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to smoke (e.g. fire), to billow smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to be hazy, to look dim
to confuse (someone), to befuddle, to bewilder, to mystify, to throw up a smokescreen, to surround with smoke
mist over a body of water, spray, suien, four decorative metal plates joined at right angles forming part of a pagoda finial
